title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Purpose- and Process-Centered Instructional Design Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design concepts and job-related foundational knowledge
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Can compare DBL and JBL approaches and select design strategies aligned with educational objectives
Can propose a process for designing real job problems (e.g., patient counseling scenarios, technical troubleshooting) using JBL methods
Develops a blended instructional design that integrates learners’ goal achievement (DBL) and process experiences (JBL)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
